column2: Burundi: BBC yemerewe gusubira gukorera mu ico gihugu
column3: Radiyo BBC yemerewe gusubira gukorera mu Burundi, nk'uko bihejeje gutangazwa n'urwego rw'Uburundi rujejwe gucungera ibimenyeshamakuru, Conseil National de la Communication (CNC). Uwurongoye urwego CNC, Madame Vestine  Nahimana, yabimenyesheje mu kiganiro n'abamenyeshamakuru inyuma y'inama y'abagize urwo rwego. BBC yari imaze neza na neza imyaka itatu yafatiwe ingingo yo guhagarikwa mu Burundi. Ingingo yari yafashwe itariki 29 ukwezi kwa gatatu mu 2019. Madame Nahimana yavuze ko mu rwego CNC baronse ikete rya BBC isaba gusubira gukorera mu Burundi  baca basanga "nta kindi gisigaye atari ukuyakira kugira ngo isubire gushira ahabona ibiganiro vyayo". CNC yari yatse BBC uruhusha rwo gukorera mu Burundi iyagiriza kurenga amategeko agenga umwuga  wo kumenyesha amakuru muri ico gihugu  hamwe n'inyafato itajanye n'umwuga. Nta biganiro yari irekuriwe gushikiriza mu Burundi, nta n'umunyamakuru yari yemerewe kuyikorera canke kuyiha inkuru mu buryo ubwaribwo bwose muri ico gihugu kuva ico gihe. BBC yari yatswe uruhusha rwo gukorera mu Burundi yagirizwa  gutosekaza izina rya reta yari irongowe ico gihe na prezida Pierre Nkurunziza. Na cane cane inyanduruko yavuye ku matohoza ku vyavugwa ko ari ibibanza abantu bapfungirwamwo mu kinyegero  kandi bakaborezwamwo igufa mu ntumbero yo gucecekesha abatavuga rumwe na reta, ivyo reta yiyamirije nk'"inkuru z'ibinyoma". Ico gihe BBC yumvirizwa n'abantu bangana na miriyoni 1.3 mu Burundi. Hemerewe ibinyamakuru bishasha vyinshi Ibinyamakuru bitari bike birimwo n'Ijwi rya Amerika (VOA),  Iwacu, radiyo Bonesha FM, Ikiriho n'ibindi vyarafatiwe ibihano mu bihe n'imvo bitandukanye vy'inyuma y'intureka za poritike zo mu 2015. Ivyo bihano vyari vyiyamirijwe n'amashirahamwe haranira uburenganzira bwa zina muntu nka Amnesty International yavuze ko vyari ingingo "zeruye z'abategetsi b'Uburundi mu gucecekesha ibimenyeshamakuru". Kuva presida Evariste Ndaishimiye ashitse ku butegetsi inyuma y'amatora yo mu 2020,  imwe mu ntumbero yashize imbere n'ukunagura imigendeneranire myiza n'ibihugu canke amashirahamwe atarabana ryiza na reta y'Uburundi kuva mu 2015. Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika n'ishirahamwe rya  Buraya biherutse gufuta ingingo z'ibihano  vyari vyarafatiye Uburundi. Bimwe bimwe nka Iwacu, Ikiriho na Bonesha FM  haheze igihe vyarahawe uruhusha rwo gusubira gukora. Madame Nahimana yavuze ko CNC yumviye akamo k'umukuru w'igihugu yasavye urwo rwego kuvugana n'ibinyamakuru vyari vyarafatiwe ibihano kugirango bisubire guhabwa impusha zo gukora. Muri iyo nama yemereye BBC gusubira gukorera mu Burundi, CNC yemereye kandi ama radiyo n'ama television mashasha: Dosiye y'iyindi radiyo, Radio Voix de Developpement Communautaire de Bubanza yasubijwe inyuma  kugira ije guhinyanyura ivyo  CNC yayisavye. Atangaza ko BBC yemerewe gusubira gukorera mu Burundi, umukuru wa CNC yagize ati:  "Twizeye ko tugiye kubandanya dukorana n'iyo radiyo mu ntumbero yo kubandanya twubahiriza umwuga w'abamenyeshamakuru n'ibimenyeshamakuru."

column2: Ndayishimiye: ‘Karashize ingani, abakozi ba Reta bitwe abatishoboye?’
column3: Umukuru w'igihugu c'Uburundi Evariste Ndayishimiye avuga ko ibibazo Uburundi bwagiye buracamwo vyatumye igihugu gisigara inyuma mu bisata bitandukanye. Akebura  abakozi gukura amaboko mu mpuzu kugira bagwize umwimbu. Mw'ijambo yaraye ashikirije Abarundi buca bahimbaza umusi mpuzamakungu wahariwe abakozi, Perezida Ndayishimiye ahamagarira Abarundi kwemanga ko basamaye hanyuma bafate ingingo yo gukura amaboko mu mpuzu. Mu gihe abakozi ba reta bari biteze ko umusi nk'uwu ari akaryo keza ko kwongerwa imishahara, Perezida Ndayishimiye avuga ko batokwitega ko bahava bongerwa agashirukabute mu gihe "n'umwenda Reta yafashe mu myaka iheze kugira ihembe abakozi utararihwa". Perezida Ndayishimiye avuga ko gushika ubu hari abakozi bironderera kwongerezwa impembo mu gihe ataco bariko bafasha reta kugira ironke uburyo bukwiye, bakagomba ko reta isaba imfashanyo kugira ngo ibahembe. Ati: "Uno musi urasanga umukozi wa Reta ashaka agashirukabute gakirurutse ariko we nyene abona abanyonora ikigega ca reta akihorera canke akabakingira ikibaba. Mbere hari naho usanga ari we nyene ariko aranyonora agaca asaba impembo irengeye. "Hari abandi bareka ibidandazwa vyari gutanga amakori bigaca ku ruhande ariko ukwezi kwahera agasaba impembo. None yibaza ko iyo mpembo ica iva hehe, ko hari aho nyene?" Perezida Ndayishimiye ntiyumva ivyo gusaba imfashanyo, kuko kubw'iwe, abakeneye imfashanyo ni abatishoboye. Ahamagarira  abarundi gutahura ko ivyo bagiye baracamwo  vyatumye basamara. Ati: "None ko umuntu wo gufashwa ari uwutishoboye, koko karashize ingani, abakozi ba Reta bitwe abatishoboye?  Jewe si uko ndavyumva; sindanavyemera; ni co gituma bintera isoni gusega". Perezida Ndayishimiye abona ko uwutakoze atari akwiye guhembwa ukwezi guheze kuko ku bw'iwe, "ni we ngumba y'ukuri kuko imana yamuhaye ubwenge n'inkomezi hanyuma abipfisha ubusa". Avuga ko muri kino gihe igihugu kirangwamwo amahoro, agasaba Abarundi guhaguruka bakiyishura ivyo bataye, bakarangura imigambi yo kwiteza imbere. Ati: "Twarabuze vyinshi, twarataye umwanya mwinshi kubera ububegito bwa benshi muri twebwe bwatumye tubura amahoro. "Muri uwo mwanya twataye, ibikorwa bitakozwe ni vyinshi kandi biraturindiriye. "Kurima, tukworora kijambere ntavyo twitaho; twarira ikija mu nda gusa, umusesekara ntiwotubajije, tukitwaza imyibutsa yataye igihe ngo ivy'ejo biraba ab'ejo. "Guhingura itunga kama uwo wari umugani kuko biteba kwimbuka ... gutunganya aho abamukerarugendo ... vyari umugani." "Ivyo vyose vyari akazi koduha itunga dukeneye kandi n'ubu karacaturindiriye".Atera akamo abarundi ko bova hasi bagakora kugira ngo bahamvye ibindi bihugu kuko vyovyo vyamaze kugera kure. Ati: "Abandi barakamaze. Barubatse amabarabara, barubaka amashure, barubaka ingomero z'umuyagankuba, barubaka ivyo ba mukerarugendo bakenera, barubaka ibikoresho vy'ubuhinga ngurukanabumenyi, barubatse amahinguriro, ubu ntaco basigaje. "Twebwe, ivyo vyose biracaturindiriye, dukure amaboko mu mpuzu dukore".

column2: Liberia: Indirimbo 'Mr Liar Man' ya George Weah yateye ibibazo vyinshi abanyagihugu
column3: Muri Liberiya haravugwa vyinshi ku muntu yoba yagiriye nabi Perezida George Weah ku buryo vyamutumye yerekana akababaro n'uburakari mu ndirimbo nshasha yasohoye muri iyi ndwi. Mr Liar Man (Nyakwubahwa Mubeshi), indirimbo igize kane isohowe n'uyu mukuru w'igihugu yahoze ari umukinyi rurangiranwa w'umupira w'amaguru yahavuye aba umunyapolitike - rimwe na rimwe agacishamwo n'ivy'umuziki, iri mu mudiho wa reggae Bimwe mu biri muri iyo ndirimbo, harimwo nka: "Mu gihugu canje, bariko bagerageza kumpiga mu vyo ntazi…Ariko Mr. Liar Man (Nyakwubahwa Mubeshi), urazi neza ko ntigeze nkora ivyo unyagiriza". Abraham Darius Dillon, umukenguzamateka azwi cane atavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi yibaza ko umukuru w'igihugu yariko avuga umunyamakuru yakora kw'iradiyo y'igihugu aherutse kwirukanwa kubera yaneguye ingene Perezida Weah arongoye igihugu, mu butumwa yacishije ku rubuga rwa Facebook. Eka n'abandi batari bake mu basanzwe bakurikiranira hafi ivya politikie hamwe n'ibimenyeshamakuru bavuga ko Perezida Weah yariko yihora uyo yahoze ari umukozi wa reta. Ariko ibiro vy'umukuru w'igihugu hamwe n'abanywanyi biwe babandanya bahakana mbere batera ivyatsi ibi bimuvugwako. Perezida Weah yahoze ari umusatirizi mu mirwi ya AC Milan, Chelsea na Paris Saint Germain, yaragiye asohora indirimbo. Mu ntango za 2000, yarasohoye ururirimbo yaririmbanye n'abahoze bakina umupira w'amaguru i Buraya yavuga ku rukundo n'ubumwe muri Afrika. Mu 2014, yararirimbanye n'umucuraranzi w'umunya Ghana, Sidney, mu ndirimbo yo guhimiriza abanyagihugu ku kiza ca Ebola mu gihe cariko kiratema gitongora mu karere ka Afrika y'Uburengero. Mu mezi aheze, aherutse gusohora n'iyindi, aho yavugamwo ibijanye no kurwanya ikiza karanda ca Covid-19. Ariko ndirimbo yateye ibibazo abantu ni iyi ya kane, aho gushika ubu abanyagihugu babandanya bibaza bati: uyu Mr Liar Man ( Nyakwubahwa Mubeshi) ni nde?

column2: Burundi: Abarongoye Islam bavuga ko ata ngorane ihari hagari ya Islam na reta
column3: Abakuru b'idini rya Islam bavuga ko biyamiriza amajambo yashikirijwe na Ndikumana Rashid, umusilamu aherutse kwifatira mu gahanga umushikiranganji w'intwaro yo hagati mu gihugu, iterambere rusangi n'umutekano. Mw'itangazo ryasohowe n'ihuriro ry'imisigiti riri kumwe n'ihuriro ry'aba-Imam mu Burundi, bamenyesha ko ivyo Ndikumana yavuze yabivuze ku gatwe kiwe bitega aya mahuriro canke "umuryango w'aba Islam mu Burundi". Ndikumana arapfunzwe inyuma y'uko yumvikanye ahamagarira umushikiranganji w'intwaro yo hagati n'umutekano, Ndirakobuca Gervais, gusaba ikigongwe, hari mu musigiti wa Madina uri muri zone Buterere mu gisagara ca Bujumbura. Umwe mu bakuru b'idini rya Islam mu Burundi yabwiye BBC ko gushika ubu nta kibabuza gusenga uko bamye basenga na mbere. Abakuriye Islam mu Burundi mw'itangazo ryabo, bamenyesha abanywanyi babo ko "ata matati ari hagati y'umuryango w'aba Islam mu Burundi" na reta y'igihugu. Zuberi Mohamed, Umukuru w'inama ya bose mu muryango w'aba Islam mu Burundi, yabwiye BBC ko bakira nk'abandi bose ivyashikirijwe na Ndirakobuca, kuko "vyaraba bose ntivyaraba aba Islam gusa". Avuga ko ivyo yavuze bitababuza gusenga uko bahora basenga. Ati: "Nta tegeko na rimwe rirasohoka ritubuza gusenga canke ritubuza guhamagarira abantu kuja gusenga. "Twebwe dufata y'uko yariko ashikiriza amakenga yoba afise canke uko abona ibintu". Zuberi avuga ko iyo habaye ingorane hagati ya reta no mu muryango w'aba Islam mu Burundi "hariho inzira bicamwo kugira ngo tuvugane, nk'uko biri mu yandi madini". Abajijwe niba ivyasabwe n'umushikiranganji Ndirakobuca bidashobora guhungabanya umutekano, Rashidi abona ko ata ngorane bishobora gutera. Ati: "Abatovyi mu mpande zose ntibabuze, ariko twebwe turazi ko aba Islam bahagaze neza, kandi ko ata ngorane zihava ziva muri ivyo gushika kuri uno munota nta kibazo kihari hagati ya reta n'aba Islam mu Burundi".

column2: Perezida Trump ariyamiriza ijambo 'ry’ ubujuju n’ibitutsi' rya Perezida Rouhani wa Irani
column3: Perezida Donald Trump wa Amerika ariyamiriza ico yise "itangazo ry'ubujuju n'ibitutsi" ryasohowe na Irani inyuma y'aho atangarije ibindi bihano kuri ico gihugu co mu burasirazuba bwo hagati. Bwana Trump yiyamirije ayo majambo aciye ku rubuga rwa Twitter, inyuma y'aho Perezida wa Irani Hassan Rouhani amenyeshereje ko iyo ngingo yerekana ko abakora mu biro vya Maison Blanche (White House) "bafise ingorane zo mu mutwe". Bwana Trump avuga ko ayo majambo yerekana ko abategetsi ba Irani "badatahura ukuri". Yatangaje ivyo bihano ku munsi wa mbere, avuga ko vyari inyishu ku "nyifato y'agasotoro" yerekanywe na Irani. Ivyo bihano vyafatiwe abantu batari bake, cane cane umutegetsi w'ikirenga, Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, yagirizwa na Trump ko ariwe "atuma ubutegetsi bwa Irani bugira inyifato itabereye". Amerika ivuga ko Ayatollah Ali Khamenei afise amatungo menshi afasha mu guhemba abasirikare bo mu murwi karuhariwe w'igisirikare ca Irani wa Islamic Revolution Guard Corps (IRCG). Ku ruhande rwiwe, Bwana Rouhani ntatahura igituma Amerika ifatira ibihano umuntu umwe gusa avuga ko yifitiye "inzu isanzwe n'ikibanza c'ugusengeramwo", akavuga ko ivyo bihano "biteye isoni kandi bifatiye ku bujuju". Avuga kandi ko Amerika ibesha iyo iriko ivuga ko yipfuza ibiganiro. Ariko Bwana Trump avuga ko Irani izi neza ko gushika ubu Amerika ariyo ya mbere ikomeye gisirikare kw'isi. Yongeyeko ati: "Igitero ico ari co cose ca Irani ku nyungu za Amerika kizokwishurwa hakoreshejwe inguvu nyinshi kandi zirenze". "Rimwe na rimwe, inguvu zirenze bishobora kuvuga ko igihugu gishobora gufutwa". Hampande ya Ayatollah Khamenei, hari n'abakuru mu gisirikare bashika umunani, hamwe n'umushikiranganji w'imigenderanire wa Irani, Mohammad Javad Zarif, nabo bashobora gufatirwa ibihano. Ukutumvikana hagati y'ivyo bihugu vyompi kwatanguye mu kwezi kwa gatanu kw'umwaka uheze wa 2018, igihe Trump yivumbura mu masezerano yo mu mwaka wa 2015 hagati ya Irani n'ibihugu bitandatu vya rutura, ku vyerekeye umugambi wayo w'uguhingura ibirwanisho vy'ubumara. Ibintu vyagiye kwunyuka kuva mu ndwi ziheze, cane cane kuva aho Irani irasiye indege (drone) ya Amerika mu ndwi iheze, ivuga ko yari yavogereye ikirere cayo, ivyo Amerika yiyamirije ivuga ko drone yayo yari mu kirere mpuzamakungu. Bwana Trump abandanya avuga ko afise ishaka ryo gutangura ibiganiro na Irani kugira habe ayandi masezerano mashasha yotuma Irani yemera guheba umugambi wayo w'uguhingura ibirwanisho vy'ubumara, be n'ico yise ibikorwa vy' "agakengere" mu karere k'uburasirazuba bwo hagati. Avuga ati: "Niba batabishaka, naho nyene nta ngorane. Ariko twipfuza ko twoganira. Ariko kandi vy'ukuri, boshaka boza vuba".

column2: Rwanda - Coronavirus: abantu 42 bahagaritswe barenze ku mategeko abuza amakoraniro
column3: Abantu 42 bahagaritswe n'igipolisi c'u Rwanda mu karere ka Gatsibo mu murenge wa Rugarama, inyuma y'aho kibasanze bakoraniye hamwe bariko basenga. Amakuru yatangajwe ku rubuga ngurukanabumenyi rw'igipolisi c'u Rwanda avuga ko abo bantu bafashwe ejo ku wa 17 kubera bahonyanze amategeko abuza abantu gukoranira hamwe mu rwego rwo kwirinda ikwirakwira ry'ikiza karanda ca COVID-19. Amategeko asaba abanyagihugu kuguma mu rugo ashirwa mu ngiro n'abajejwe umutekano mu Rwanda, babuza abantu gusohoka mu ngo zabo. Gusa, Guma mu rugo yaraheze kireste uduce tumwe tumwe i Kigali,  Nyamagabe na Nyamasheke. Umuvugizi w'igipolisi mu ntara y'Iburasirazuba, Chief Inspector of Police (CIP) Humdun Twizeyimana, avuga ko baronse amakuru y'abo bantu bariko bakoraniye hamwe bayahawe n'abanyagihugu. Ati: "Abaturage baduhaye amakuru ko hari abantu barenze ku mabwiriza ya Leta yo kurwanya Koronavirusi". "Twahise dutegura igikorwa co kubafata, nibwo twabasanze bateraniye ahantu mu bisambu bari mu masengesho". Leta y'u Rwanda iheruka gufungura amasengero inyuma y'amezi ane yugawe kubera coronavirus, gusa yatanze ingingo ategerezwa gukurikiza. Nk'uko amakuru ari kuri urwo rubuga abandanya abivuga, CIP Twizeyimana yagiriza abo bantu ko "bari bakoranye batubahirijwe n'ingingo n'imwe kandi bavuye mu mihingo itandukanye". Avuga kandi ko ata n'umwe yari yambaye agapfukamunwa, batanubahirije ingingo yo kutegerana kandi ata n'amazi yo gukaraba yari ahari, ngo ivyo bigashobora gutuma banduzanya. Ati: "Bose bari bazi neza ko ivyo barimwo bitemewe ariko babirenzeko barabikora.... Hariya bari bateraniye nta bwirinzi ubwo aribwo bwose bubahirije ku buryo umwe muri bo abaye yanduye yashobora kwanduza abandi." Mu Rwanda, abantu bashika 1,473 nibo batangajwe ko banduye umugera wa coronavirus, muri bo bane bakaba barapfuye. Iki gihugu camaraze igihe c'iminsi 45 mu mategeko ya guma mu rugo, ubu akaba yaratezuwe. Hagati aho, hari uturere duherutse gusubizwa muri ayo mategeko, ubutegetsi bukavuga ko bwafashe iyi ngingo inyuma y'ubusesanguzi bwakozwe n'inzego z'ubuzima ku kiza karanda ca coronavirus" muri utwo turere.

column2: Pierre Buyoya na bagenziwe bavuga iki ku munyororo wo guherayo baciriwe?
column3: Petero Buyoya na bagenziwe baherutse kwagirwa n'icaha co kugandagura umukuru w'igihugu Melchior Ndadaye bariyamiriza urubanza rwaciwe na sentare y'u Burundi. Itangazo Bwana Buyoya wenyene yarungikiye BBC rivuga ko abafatiwe ibi bihano bavuga ko bafise uburenganzira bwo kwungururiza mu masentare yo mu gihugu canke mpuzamakungu. Sentare ntahinyuzwa mu Burundi yakatiye Bwana Buyoya - yatwaye u Burundi ubugira kabiri (1987 - 1993 na 1996 - 2003) - hamwe n'abandi bantu 15 umunyororo wo guherayo. Abandi batatu baciriwe gupfungwa imyaka 20 nayo umwe yambitswe izera. Abaciriwe urubanza bose hamwe ni 20 - benshi bahoze ari abasirikare bakuru - bane (4) muri bo ni bo basanzwe bapfunze uwundi yahora yidegemvya mu Burundi, abandi bose baba hanze. Iri tangazo rivuga ko uru rubanza rufise imvo za politiki "na rirya rwatanguye inyuma y'indyane za politike zadutse mu 2015". Rivuga ko urubanza rwabo "rwatanguye mu gihe igihugu cari mu ndyane zishingiye ku kiringo ca gatatu ca Perezida Pierre Nkurunziza cari giteye kubiri n'ibwirizwashingiro". Bavuga ko intumbero y'uru rubanza "kwari ukurondera kwiyegereza abanyagihugu ku mvo za politike n'ubwoko, bitegurira amatora aheruka ya 2020". Bavuga kandi ko uru rubanza rwaciwe kugira ngo "bace imitima abanyagihugu mu gihe bwaca bibuka igandagurwa rya Perezida Melchior Ndadaye", igikorwa cabaye uyu munsi ku wa gatatu. Uru rubanza rwarigeze gutanguzwa mu mpera za 1998, ariko hafatwa abo benshi bavuze ko bari abantu bato bato cane batari kuba ari bo bateguye igandagurwa ry'umukuru w'igihugu. Mu 2019 Leta yasohoye imitahe yo gufata abari abasirikare bakomakomeye hamwe na Bwana Pierre Buyoya, intumwa y'ishirahamwe ry'ubumwe bwa Afrika mu karere ka Sahel, ubu uba muri Mali. Aba bipfuzwa n'ubutungane ntibigeze bafatwa n'igipolisi mpuzamakungu ngo bashikirizwe u Burundi, ntibizwi neza niba icemezo gishasha ca sentare kizotuma bafatwa. Iyi sentare yategetse kandi ko bose hamwe bishura hafi imiliyaridi 103 z'amafranga y'u Burundi, ku bushake bwabo canke ku nguvu. Aba baciriwe urubanza bavuga ko kuva mu ntango batigeze bahabwa uburenganzira bwo guserukirwa na rirya basanzwe "baba hanze kubera imvo z'umutekano wabo". Bavuga ko abashikirizwamanza mpuzamakungu babo "leta yabigije inyuma ibima impusha zo kwinjira mu Burundi kugira ngo bababuranire". Itangazo ryabo rivuga ko urwo ari urubanza ruteye kubiri n'amategeko.

column2: Samuel Eto'o yahoze akinira Barcelona yemeye ko yanyereje ikori ry’imiriyoni 3.2 z’ama pawundi
column3: Samuel Eto'o  yahoze ari umusatirizi wa Kameruni yemeye icaha co kunyereza umusoro ungana n’imiriyoni 3,2 z’amapawundi yakuye mw’igurisha ry’isanamu yiwe (droit à l'image /image rights) igihe yakinira Barcelona. Uyu yabaye umukinyi wa mbere wa Afrika w’umwaka incuro zine yaciriwe umunyororo urindirijwe (suspended prison/sursis) w’amezi 22 igihe yarengutswa imbere ya sentare muri Espagne ejo ku wa mbere. Ategerezwa kuriha aya mafaranga yose aheranye, hamwe n’ihadabu ry’imiriyoni 1.55 z’amapawundi. Abashingwamanza bagiriza Eto'o ko yananiwe no kumenyesha amatungo yiwe yavuye mw’igurishwa ry’isanamu yiwe hagati ya 2006 na 2009. Eto'o ni we mukinyi wundi aherutse gushirwa ku rutonde rurerure rw’abakinyi mvamahanga bakurikiranwa ku caha co kunyereza amakori muri Espagne muri ino myaka, harimwo Cristiano Ronaldo, Lionel Messi, Jose Mourinho na Neymar. Uyu munya-Kameruni w’imyaka 41, ubu akaba ari we arongoye ishirahamwe ry’umupira w’amaguru rya Kameruni, yinjiye muri Barcelona mu 2004 afise imyaka 23. Yarakiniye kandi Real Madrid, Inter Milan, Chelsea na Everton mu kiringo ciwe cose yamaze akina umupira w’amaguru, imbere y’uko akukuruka mu 2019. Yarengukishijwe muri sentare Ciudad de la Justicia i Barcelona ari kumwe n’uwahoze ari umuhagarikizi wiwe, Jose Maria Mesalles, nawe akaba yahawe umunyororo urindirijwe w’amezi 12 hamwe n’ihadabu. Sentare yabwiwe ko Eto'o yagurishije isanamu yiwe mw’ikompanyi ifise icicaro muri Hongrie/Hungary ariko yoyo ikaba yaramenyesheje amatungo yayo muri ico gihugu gifise amakori ari hasi. Eto'o yabwiye sentare ati: "Ndemera ivyo nagirizwa kandi nzoriha ivyo nishuzwa, ariko reka menyeshe ko nari nkiri umwana kandi ko nakurikiza ivyo uwahoze ari umuhagarikizi wanje Jose Maria Mesalles, nafata nka dawe, yansaba gukora ico gihe”.

column2: El Clasico: Urukino hagati ya Barcelona na Real Madrid rwigijwe inyuma ku gutinya imvururu
column3: Urukino rw'umupira w'amaguru ruzwi nka El Clasico rw'uno mwaka hagati ya Barcelona na Real Madrid rwigijwe inyuma kubera ubwoba bw'uko hokwaduka akaguma. Urwo rukino rwo mu ciciro ca mbere c'umupira w'amaguru wo muri Esipanye, rwagomba kuba itariki 26 z'ukwa cumi, ariko haraciye iminsi hari imyiyerekano i Barcelona. Iyo myiyerekano yatanguye nyuma y'aho abarongozi icenda b'abaharanira ukwiyonkora kw'intara ya Calalonia batariwe muri yombi. Yaba Barcelona canke Real Madrid, zose zaranse ivyasabwa vy'uko urwo rukino rwokwimurirwa i Madrid. Ayo makipe yasavye ko urwo rukino rwokwimurirwa kuwa gatatu itariki 18 z'ukwa cumi na kabiri. Umumenyereza Ernesto Valverde yavuze ko Barcelona idashaka ko urwo rukino rwimurirwa i Madrid kuko bazoja i Salvia Prague mu rukino rwa Champions League itariki 23 z'ukwa cumi, iminsi itatu imbere y'itariki El Clasico yagomba kuberako. Umumenyereza wa Real Madril, Zinedine Zidane, yabajijwe ivyerekeye kwimura urwo rukino mu kiganiro n'abamenyeshamakuru uno munsi, aca avuga ati "tuzoba twiteguye gukina kw'itariki tuzobwirwa n'ababijejwe." Yongeyeko ati "tuzokora ivyo vyose tuzosabwa." Uburongozi bw'ihiganwa La Liga bwigije inyuma urwo rukino nyuma yo kubisabwa kubera "imvo zidasanzwe zirengeye ubushobozi bwabwo" kuko hategekanijwe iyindi myiyerekano  ku munsi urwo rukino rwobereyeko.

column2: Ukraine: Perezida Zelensky yagize isanganya ry’imodoka ariko ‘ntiyakomeretse cane’
column3: Perezida Volodymyr Zelensky wa Ukraine yagize isanganya ry’imodoka nk’uko umuvugizi wiwe abitangaza. Imodoka yunguruza abantu yagonganye n’imodoka y’umukuru w’igihugu n’iz’abamugendanira ku mugwa mukuru Kyiv, nk’uko Sergii Nykyforov yabitangaje mw’itangazo rito. Ati: "Umukuru w’igihugu yapimwe n’umuganga, ntiyakomeretse cane”. Umushoferi w’iyo modoka yagonganye n’iy’umukuru w’igihugu yaciye avurirwa aho nyene hanyuma aca arunguruzwa na rusehabaniha. Nykyforov avuga ko inyamiramabi ziriko zirakora amatohoza ku bintu vyose bijanye n’iri sanganya. Nta zindi nsiguro yatanze. Ibi bibaye inyuma y’aho Perezida Zelensky, ubu afise imyaka 44, yari yagendeye igisagara giherutse kubohozwa ca Izyum, ikirindiro gikomeye co gushikana uburyo ku ngabo  kiri mu buraruko bushira ubuseruko bwa Ukraine, ejo ku wa gatatu. Yashimiye ingabo zagize uruhara muri iki gitero co kwivuna Abarusiya banyaze ubutaka bwabo, mbere anahagarikira iduzwa ry’ibendera. Mu misi iheze, igisirikare ca Ukraine catangaje ko cabohoje uturere tw’ubutaka bwanyazwe, maze ingabo z’Uburusiya zisubira inyuma.

column2: US: Umuganga w'umwirabure yishwe na Covid avuga azize ivangura rishingiye ku rukoba
column3: Umuganga w'umwiraburekazi mu gisagara ca Indianapolis yishwe na Covid-19 haciye indwi nkeya yagirije umuganga w'umuzungu ko yanse kumuvura kubera ibara ry'urukoba rwiwe. Mw'ireresi yasohoye ari mu bitaro vy'ishure kaminuza ya Indiana, Susan Moore yavuze ko yarinze  "kwitakambira" ngo avurwe. Mu guhoza umuryango wabuze, abarongoye ibitaro bavuga ko bafashe nka nkama ibi birego vy'ivangura rishingiye ku rukoba ariko ntaco bavuze ku barwayi bandi boba bashobora kuba bahura n'ibi bibazo. Muri Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, Abirabure nibo babangamiwe cane na Covid gusumba Abazungu, nk'uko ubushakashatsi buvyerekana. Muganga Moore w'imyaka 52, yapfiriye ku rindi vuriro ku wa Mungu. Mu butumwa yari yanditse ku rubuga rwa Facebook ku wa 04 z'uku, asigura ukuntu umuganga avuga ko yari umuzungu yirengagije ububabare bwiwe, mu gihe yariko arira atakamba kandi vyanka n'uko ahema. Yanditse ati: "Nta n'uko yumva amaborogo y'amahaha yanje, ntiyigeze ankorakora kugira anyumvirize. Yaranse no kumfata ibipimo. Namubwiye nti 'we ntushobora kwibaza ingene merewe'." Itangazo ryasohowe n'ibi bitaro rivuga riti: "Nk'ishirahamwe ryiyemeje guharanira uburinganire n'ukurwanya ubusumbasumbane bushingiye ku rukoba mu gisata c'amagara y'abantu, dufashe nka nkama cane ibirego vy'ivanguramoko kandi tugiye gukora amatohoza". "Turishimiye ukwitanga n'ubuhinga bw'abakozi bacu n'ingene bitaho neza abarwayi bacu imisi yose". 'Uku niko abirabire bicwa' Muganga Moore yatowe Covid ku wa 29 z'ukwa cumi na rimwe, akaba yajanywe mu bitaro amenetse umutwe cane kandi akorora amaraso, vyanka n'uko ahema. Ariko, n'aho na we nyene yari umuganga, yavuze ko vyagoranye kugira ngo yakirwe. Muganga Moore yavuze ko yatakamvye asaba ko bomuha wa muti wo kurwanya imigera, Remdesivir, kandi ko bomupima mu gikiriza. Yavuze ko uyo muganga w'umuzungu igihe kimwe yamubwiye ko ata burenganzira afise bwo guhabwa uwo muti, amutegeka gutaha. Ku rubuga rwa Facebook, Muganga Moore yagize ati: "Yantumye numva ko umengo nsa n'umuntu afata ibiyayuramutwe. Ariko kandi yari azi ko ndi umuganga. Nta biyayuramutwe mfata, kandi nari mu bubabare budasanzwe". Muganga Moore avuga ko yari yasavye umwunganirizi mu vyo ubuvuzi, kandi ko yari yasavye y'uko yopfuma arungikwa kuvurirwa ahandi. Yahavuye arekurwa arataha, ariko biba ngombwa ko asubizwayo haciye amasaha makeya gusa bisubiye kwanka. Muganga Moore ati: "Uku niko abirabure bicwa. Iyo ubarungitse muhira kandi badashobora kuronka ingene birwanira". Muri ubwo butumwa, yaranditse avuga ko umuyobozi mukuru w'ivyo bitaro yari yavuze ko abakozi bari guhabwa inyigisho ku bijanye n'ubutandukane bw'abantu. Hagati aho, uyu muganga w'umuzungu yagirijwe ntiyigeze asaba imbabazi nk'uko yari yavyemeye. Muganga Moore yabandanije avuga ati: "Jewe mvuga, kandi mbandanya ndabivuga, ko iyaba nari umuzungu, ibi bibazo ntavyo nari kugira". Ivyabaye kuri Muganga hamwe n'urupfu rwiwe vyarateje induru nyinshi ku bijanye n'ibibazo vy'ivanguramoko bihanze abirabure ba Amerika mu bijanye n'ubuvuzi. Uwu mugera urasinzikaje cane abirabure n'izindi nkehwa muri Amerika. Abirabure muri Amerika bafise igihamana kibi co guhitanwa n'uwu mugera ku ncuro zitatu zose gusumba abazungu.

column2: Champions League: Real Madrid igikombe ca 14, Liverpool mu marushwa
column3: Ivyizigiro vya Liverpool vyo gutsindira igikombe kigira indwi co mw'ihiganwa rihuza imirwi yabaye iya mbere I Bulaya (Champions League) birangiye mu mubabaro aho iguye mu minwe ya Real Madrid i Paris. Umusatirizi wa  Brezili Vinicius Jr, niwe ayihumiye, mu kwinjiza igitsindo kimwe rudende mu rukino rwose, aho yari yiketswe ko yoba yari yaraririye, Trent Alexander-Arnold akaba ari we yatumye ahagarara neza, bituma Real Madrid itahukana iki gikombe kigize 14, aho nyene niyo iherutse gutsindira ihiganwa rya Espagne, La Liga. Liverpool yaronse amahirwe menshi yo gutsinda ariko umunyegori Thibaut Courtois  yari yariye amavubi, uyu yahoze asamira Chelsea akaba yabanje gukurayo umupira wari utewe na Sadio Mane, imbere yo gukurayo uwundi mupira ukomeye wari utewe mw'igori na Mohamed Salah. Mohamed Salah, yateshejwe iki gitsindo mu gihe yarondera kwihora ivyo yabonye mu rukino nk'uru nyene rwo mu 2018 na Real Madrid nyene, aho vyabaye ngombwa ko ava mu kibuga mu gice ca mbere kubera imvune. Uru rukino rwategerezwa gutangura isaha imwe z'ijoro mu masaha mpuzamakungu (ni ukuvuga isaha zitatu z'ijoro mu masaha y'Uburundi n'Urwanda)  rwatanguye rucerewe iminota 36 yose, kubera "ibibazo vy'umutekano" inyuma y'aho hari amasanamu asohote yerekana isinzi ry'abantu hanze y'ikibuga bariko bagerageza kwinjira mu kibuga ca Stade de France. Gutsindwa kwa Liverpool gutumye uyu murwi warondera gukora ibidasanzwe mu mupira w'amaguru mu gutahukana ibikombe bine muri uno mwaka w'inkino urangiye, utahira bibiri gusa, ica FA (FA Cup) hamwe n'ica Carabao (Carabao Cup).

column2: Ghana: Igiporisi cabujije ihishurwa ry'Umwaka Mushasha ritera ibibazo
column3: Dickens Olewe BBC News Igiporisi muri Ghana cagabishije abarongoye ukwemera n’amashengero ko batokora ihishurwa basanzwe bakora ku Mwaka Mushasha kuko hari abo ritera ubwoba, abandi umwitwarariko, mbere abandi bagapfa. Uburenganzira bwo gusenga ntibutegerezwa kurengera uburenganzira bw’abandi, nk’uko igiporisi cavuze mw’itangazo. Abanegura iyo ngingo bavuga ko iteye kubiri n’uburenganzira butangwa n’ibwirizwa shingiro mu kwishira no kwizana ku bijanye no kwemera  ko rero iteye kubiri n’amategeko. Aba-Kristu baharurwa muri za miriyoni akenshi barakoranira mu masengero kugira bumve ivyo  abapasitori  babahishurira ku vyo beretswe ku bizobashikira mu mwaka mushasha. Hari abahishurirwa ivyiza bibarindiriye ariko hari n’abagabishwa ko barindiriwe n’ivyago. Iyo ngingo y’igiporisi yatanguye gusohoka mu mwaka uheze igihe abantu bari barengewe n’ukugabishwa kw’impfu n’akaga, nk’uko ikinyamakuru co kuri internet My Joy Online kivyandika. Mw’itangazo, igiporisi casavye amadini atandukanye”gafashanya” na co no “gukoresha uburyo bwemewe n’amategeko um gushurira ivyo beretswe”. Ariko umunyamategeko Sammy Sarko yavuze ko  iyo ngingo y’igiporisi “iteye kubiri n’amategeko.” Yanditse ati: “Ntikeneye no kubanza kwihwezwa na sentare ya mbere nkuru muri Ghana. Nta tegeko muri Ghana riha igiporisi ububasha bwo kugenzura ingene ivyahishuwe bimenyeshwa mu gihugu”. Yongeyeko ati : “Ubwisanzure bw’idini burenze ubwisanzure bwo gusenga muri sinagoga, isengero canke umusigiti. Bisigura ko abantu badategerezwa guca kubiri n’ivyo bemera kugira bisunge umuco canke reta kiretse buteye kubiri n’itegeko  iri canke irindi.” Igiporisi cavuze co cashinze itariki ya 27 Kigarama (12) nk’umunsi wo gutangura kwubahiriza ingingo zijanye no kumenyesha ivyahishuwe. Iryo tangazo ryavuze riti: “Uyu munsi ni uwo kutwibutsa twese, gukora ibikorwa bijanye n’ukwemera hatarenzwe akarimbi k’amategeko kugira hubahirizwe  ituze ridahungabanywa n’umwitwarariko uvuye ku mburi y’ibibi canke urupfu bigiye gushika”.

column2: Sharia: kubera iki iri tegeko rya Islam ribuza umuzik? Haruna Nkunduwiga arasigura
column3: Inyuma y’aho aba Taliban bafatiye ubutegetsi muri Afghanistan, ikintu ca mbere batangaje ni uko iki gihugu gitegerezwa kugendera kw’itegeko rya Islam, rizwi nka Sharia. Muri iri tegeko, hari vyinshi bibujijwe, kimwe muri vyo ni  umuziki. Mu ndwi iheze, umuvugizi w’aba Taliban Zabihulah Mujahid yabwiye ikinyamakuru New York Times ko umuziki ubujijwe mw’idini rya Islam. Mu gihe c’ubutegetsi  bw'aba Talibani mu myaka ya 1990, umuziki hafi ya wose, televiziyo n'amazu ya sinema vyari bibujijwe kandi kubirengako vyashoboraga kugira ingaruka zikomeye. Iri tegeko Sharia ririmwo ibifatwa nk’indenzarugero. BBC yashatse kumenya ico iri tegeko rivuga n’uko Islam ifata umuziki muri rusangi, ikaba yavuganye na Haruna Nkunduwiga yigeze kurongora umuryango w’aba-Islam mu Burundi. Haruna Nkunduwiga avuga ko iri tegeko ari itegeko ngenderwako rikunze gukurikizwa mu bihugu vya Islam, ariko ridakoreshwa mu bindi bihugu nk’Uburundi kubera Islam iri kumwe n’ayandi madini. Fyonda aho hejuru wumvirize ingene Haruna Nkunduwiga avuga.

column2: Burundi : 17 bapfunzwe bikekwa gushaka kunyaga abanyagihugu mu rudandazwa rw'amafaranga
column3: Abantu 17 bo mw'ishirahamwe Crowd1 ricuruza amafaranga ku buhinga ngurukanabumenyi bari mu minwe y'igipolisi bagirizwa gukora inama y'ishirahamwe ritazwi n'amategeko. Umuvugizi w'ubushikiranganji bw'umutekano yabwiye Radio Isanganiro ko abo barobowe mu bandi barenga 300 bari bafashwe bari muri iyo nama ejo ku wa kabiri ku mugoroba n'igipolisi c'u Burundi. Pierre Nkurikiye avugira ubwo bushikiranganji avuga y'uko abo bantu bafashwe n'igipolisi bari mu nama muri zone Rohero mu gisagara ca Bujumbura. Avuga ko abari mu minwe y'igipolisi ari abariko bakorwako amatohoza kubijanye n'uko  ishirahamwe Crowd1 ryoba rifise intumbero yo kwiba abanyagihugu. Haciye amezi make ibanki nkuru y'igihugu, BRB, igabishije Abarundi kwirinda urudandazwa rw'amafaranga rukorwa biciye mu mihora ngurukanabumenyi bita 'monnaies virtuelles' canke crypto-monnaies. Mw'itangazo yasohoye mu kw'umunani umwaka uheze, BRB yavuze ko urudandazwa rw'amafaranga yo kuri iyo mihora nka Bitcoin, Ether, Litecoin, Onecoin,  Fahari Cash Coin, Ello Cash Coin rutemewe. Jean Ciza, umukuru w'iyo banki, yavuze ko ayo mafaranga akoreshwa mu buryo butagira amategeko bwisunga ahantu na hamwe kw'isi, kuko ngo nta banki n'imwe y'igihugu kw'isi yose irayemera. Ati: "Ivyo bituma ibikorwa muri ayo mafaranga bisa n'ivyo ubusuma…" Abatari bacye muri iki gihe barinjira mu rudandazwa rw'amafaranga mu buryo butandukanye leta z'ibihugu zimwe zivuga ko rutemewe.

column2: Tony Blair avuga ko ingingo ya US yo gukura ingabo muri Afghanistan ari 'ubujuju'
column3: Tony Blair yahoze ari umushikiranganji wa mbere w'Ubwongereza avuga ko ingingo ya Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika yo gukura ingabo muri Afghanistan ari iy'"ubujuju", ibi yabivuze mw'ijambo yashikirije ubwa mbere kuva Kabul yigaruriwe n'aba Taliban ku wa Mungu uheze. Aciye ku rubuga ngurukanabumenyi rwiwe, yavuze ko guta Afghanistan n'abanyagihugu bayo "biteye agahinda, ni akaga kandi ntivyari bikenewe". Blair ni we yari umushikiranganji wa mbere w'Ubwongereza igihe iki gihugu gitera Afghanistan, kiri kumwe na Amerika mu 2001, inyuma y'ibitero vyo ku wa 11 z'ukw'icenda 2001. Avuga ko imirwi  y'abarwanyi yose yiyitirira idini irya Islam izoryoherwa cane kubona ingabo mpuzamakungu zivuye muri Afghanistan. Blair avuga ko ari "nkenerwa ko ingabo z'Ubwongereza ziguma muri Afghanistan "gushika abo bose bipfuza guhunga bavanywe muri ico gihugu". Uyu yahoze arongoye umugambwe w'Abakozi (Labour) avuga ati : "Dutegerezwa guhungisha kandi tugaha indaro abo bose  dufiseko ububasha - abo banya Afghanistan badufashije kandi twakoranye,  kandi bafise uburenganzira bwo gukingirwa". Yongerako y'uko ibi bidategerezwa gukoranwa "akarigangamuhogo, ahubwo bikorwe mu bugwaneza nk'igikorwa ngombwa". Blair avuga ko ingingo yo kuva muri Afghanistan yatumwe n'imvo za poritike, akayifata ko yafashwe "hisunzwe icivugo ca poritike c'ubujuju co kurangiza 'intambara zidahera'" - icivugo cakoreshwa na Perezida Joe Biden wa Amerika mu gihe yari mu myiyamamazo y'amatora. Amerika ifise integuro yo kugeza ku wa 31 igikorwa co kuva muri Afghanistan  - ariko Perezida Biden avuga ko ingabo za Amerika zishobora kuguma muri ico gihugu inyuma y'iryo genekerezo kugira zifashe guhungisha abantu. Blair aremera ko hari amakosa yakozwe kuri Afghanistan, ariko ko "ku gihamana kibi hakozwe ayandi makosa mu gukosora aya makosa". Avuga ko n'ubwo hari "utunenge, inyungu nyazo zashitsweko mu myaka 20 iheze" zisa n'uko zipfuye ubusa. Avuga ko "imirwi  y'abarwanyi yose yiyitirira idini irya Islam kw'isi yose iri mu munezero". Yongerako y'uko Uburusiya, Ubushinwa na Irani ari vyo bigiye kuhungukira. Perezida Biden yiyemeje ko "umunyamerika uwo ari we wese ashaka gutaha, tuzogutahana", ariko akaba yemeza ko iki gikorwa co guhungisha abantu  ari co "gikorwa ca mbere kigoye gushika ubu".

column2: Umunyarwandakazi Isabelle Kamariza ku rutonde rwa Forbes
column3: Umunyarwandakazi Isabelle Kamariza ari ku rutonde rw'ikinyamakuru co muri Amerika, gitanga udushimwe, Forbes. Ni urutonde rw'abagore 8 ba mbere muri Afrika, baranzwe n'ibikorwa bihindura ubuzima bw'abandi cane cane abari mu bibazo bakeneye gufashwa. Isabelle Kamariza yashimwe kubera ikigo ciwe 'SolidAfrica', kigemurira abarwayi badashobora kwifungurira mu bitaro bine mu Rwanda. Yavuganye na Florentine Kwizera, atangura amubaza uko yakiriye ako gashimwe (umviriza aho hejuru).

column2: Perezida Nkurunziza w'u Burundi hari ivyo asaba amadini kwirinda, rimwe rivuga ko 'rizovuga ukuri'
column3: Perezida Petero Nkurunziza w'Uburundi asaba abarongoye amadini ko bokwirinda kugwa mu mutego muri kino gihe u Burundi buriko bwitegurira amatora yo mu mwaka uza wa 2020. Amwe mu madini nka Ekleziya Katolika yoyo ivuga ko bigisha iyobokamana ariko ryerekeye n'ivyo abantu barimwo. Mw'ijambo ryiwe yashikirije yibuka imyaka ine amaze atowe n'abanyagihugu ubwabo ku ncuro ya kabiri, Bwana Nkurunziza avuga ko bokwirinda "kugwa mu mutego w'abahanuzi b'ibinyoma n'inyigisho zikomoka hanze" avuga ko zitajanye n'ivy'Imana. Bwana Nkurunziza avuga ati: "Si ivy'imbeshere, bamwe mu bakozi b'Imana baraguye, abandi barakomereka bongera bakomeretsa abayoboke babo; babera umuzimagiza abo bajejwe aho kubabera urumuri n'icitegererezo". Ntadoma urutoke kw'idini iri canke ririya, gusa Ekleziya Katolika ni yo ikunze kwagirizwa ko yivanga mu vya politike. Bavuga ko ibi ibikora cane cane mu gihe ishikiriza aho ihagaze ku biraba ubuzima bw'igihugu mu butumwa bukunda gusomwa mu masengero yose ya Katolika mu gihugu. Abasenyeri ba Katolika bobo bamenyesha ko ata nyigisho za politike batanga, ahubwo ko bigisha iyobokamana ariko ryerekeye n'ivyo abantu barimwo "kuko iyobokamana rirangukira mu buzima bw'abantu". Mu ndwi iheze, mu birori vy'uguhimbaza umunsi mukuru wa Assomption, Pascal Nyabenda arongoye inama nshingamateka, yasavye abarongoye Ekleziya Katolika kuguma hagati na hagati, ntiberekane aho bahagaze mu vya politike kuko ngo bitsitaza abakirisu. Mu kumwishura, Umuvugizi w'inama y'abepiskopi mu Burundi, Yohakimu Ntahondereye, yamenyesheje ko bazovuga ijambo ry'Imana uko riri ata gucisha iruhande, "n'aho hari aho rigera rikababaza".

column2: DR Congo: Ekleziya Gatorika isaba abapatiri bavyaye kuva mu mabanga
column3: Urwandiko rw'Inama y'Abepiskopi ba Repubulika y'Intwaro Rusangi ya Congo, CENCO, rwanyereye rugashika mu minwe y'ibinyamakuru rusaba abapatiri bo muri Congo bavyaye abana gutanga imihoho mu mabanga yabo y'ubusaserdoti, nk'uko vyandikwa n'ikinyamakuru RFI. Inama y'abepiskopi CENCO, itegeka ko kizira y'uko abapatiri barangura amabanga y'abubatse. Urwo rwandiko rusohotse mu gihe Papa Francis yimirije kugendera Repubulika y'Intwaro Rusangi ya Congo muri Mukakaro (7) uyu mwaka. Muri uru rwandiko rw'impapuro 19 rwiswe "A l'école de Jésus-Christ. Pour une vie sacerdotale authentique" (ni ukuvuga: Kw'ishure rya Yezu/Yesu Kristu/Kristo. Ubuzima nyabwo bw'ukwihebera Imana), abasenyeri bavuga ko ubuzima bw'igipatiri budashobora kubangikanwa n'ubuzima bw'ukuba serugo. CENCO isaba uwihebeye Imana uwo ari we wese afise umwana "gusaba uruhusha Papa rwo kuva muri ayo mabanga", nk'uko bisubirwamwo na RFI. Uru rwandiko ruvuga ko mu gihe hogira abihebeye Imana bovyanka, musenyeri ashobora kwitura Vaticano kugira ngo ifate ibihano vyo ku rwego rwa nyuma, ibi bigasigura kwirukanwa burundi muri Ekleziya. Hari igice kimwe muri uru rwandiko rwa CENCO kivuga ibijanye n'abana b'aba bapatiri hamwe na ba nyina babo. Inama nkuru y'Abepiskopi ivuga ko ishaka "gushira ibintu ahabona" ku bijanye n'ingene ibintu bimeze kuri bo, ikibutsa ko muri rusangi usanga "banenwa mu kibano". Ico gice kigira kiti: "Ni ngombwa kuri twebwe ko twemeza ko abo bantu bariho kandi ko bababarira ku mutima".i: "Ni ngombwa kuri twebwe ko twemeza ko abo bantu bariho kandi ko bababarira ku mutima". Ikibazo c'abihebeye Imana bavyara abana muri Ekleziya Gatorika ni ikibazo giteje impari no mu bindi bihugu vy'akarere no kw'isi. Mu mpera z'umwaka uheze uwari Musenyeri mukuru wa Paris, Musenyeri Michel Aupetit, yasavye imbabazi aca atanga n'imihoho mu mabanga yiwe kubera "umubano udasanzwe n'umugore". Ico gihe kandi, Patiri Wenceslas Munyeshyaka w'umunyarwanda, yahagaritswe ku kuba padiri wa paruwasi ya Brionne mu Bufaransa inyuma y'uko bimenyekanye ko yemeye mu nzego z'ubutegetsi ko ari se w'umuhungu yavutse mu kw'indwi 2010.

column2: Yoshiro Mori: Umukuru wa Olympic za Tokyo aratanga imihoho kubera kuvuga 'ibitabereye' ku bagore
column3: Umukuru w'umugwi utegura inkino za Olympic zizobera Tokyo agiye gutanga imihoho inyuma yo kunegurwa ko yavuze ibintu "bitabereye" ku bagore. Yoshiro Mori, w'oimyaka 83, vyanditswe ko yavuze ngo abagore bavuga menshi kandi ko inama n'abagore bo mu nama nyobozi ''zitwara umwanya muremmure''. Ayo majambo yaradugije ifurufumbi ry;abavyiyamiriza none Mori yarasavye imbabazi ico gihe ariko avuga ko atazotanga imihoho. Ariko  yagumye yotwa igitutu co gutanga imihoho. Mori, yahoze ari umushikiranganji wa mbere, yitezwe gutanga imihoho  ku mugaragaro mu nama idasanzwe izoba ku wa gatanu inyuma yo  kuvuga ivyo ku ndwi iheze. Ibigo bikomeye bishigikira izo nkino navyo vyari vyashize amajwi hejuru mu kunegura ivyo yavuze harimwo na Toyota, iri mu bakomeye bshigikira cane inkino za Olympic. Umukuru wa Toyota, Akio Toyota yavuze ko iyo kompanyi "yababajwe'' n'ivyashikirijwe. Ku wa kabiri umugwi w'abashingwamanza b'abagore bambaye impunzu zera mu kwiyamiriza ivyavuzwe na Mori, hari n'abagabo bashigikiye mu kwambara uko nyene. Ku bw'ibinyamakuru vyo mu Buyapani, abantu bashika 400 nabo baranditse bavuga ko bahagaritse gusaba gukorera ubushake mu nkino za Olympic, zitegekanijwe mu bihe biri imbere uyu mwaka. Inama y'abarongoye umugwi utegura inkino ubu igizwe n'anbantu 24, batanu muri bo bakaba ari abagore. Mu 2019,inama y'abaronmgoye uwo mugwi-ujejwe guhitamwo abayapani bazokwitaba inkino,yihaye ihangiro ryo kwongereza igitigiri c'abagore bayigize gushika ku 40 kw'ijana. Mori bivugwa ko yagize ati: "Turamutse tudugije igitigiri c'abnagore bagize inama nyobozi, dutegerezwa kubasha kugabanya umwanya bafata mu kuvuga, barafise ingorane yo kurangiza, ivyo navyo bikaba bishavuza." Mori arazwi mu gihugu kuba yakuze kugwa mu rudubi no kuvuga ibitabereye abashitsi igihe yari mu nabanga hagati ya 2000 na 2001. \yabwiye ikinyamakuru co mu Yapani Mainichi ko abagore bo mu muryangoi wiwe nabo bamuryagaguye kubera ivyo yavuze.

column2: Kenya igiye guhererwa n'inkingo za Covid-19
column3: Uwujejwe umugambi wo gukingira ikiza ca Covid-19 muri Kenya yabwiye BBC ko ububiko bw'inkingo Kenya yahawe buzoba bugaragara mu ntango z'indwi iza. Dr Willis Akhwale yavuze ko Kenya yari yaronse inkingo zirenga umuriyoni mu nkingo imiriyoni 3,5 za AstraZenea ico gihugu cari casavye umugambi Covax (ujejwe kuronsa inkingo ibihugu). Yagize ati "twateye incanco abanye Kenya bashika hafi 940.000, rero nta zindi nkingo dusigaranye." Ibi bisigura yuko abanye Kenya bari munsi ya 2% ari bo baronse urukingo rwa mbere. Abajejwe ivy'amagara bari bizigiye gutangura gutanga urukingo rwa kabiri kuva mu ndwi yambere y'ukwezi kwa gatandatu, ariko iyo gahunda isa n'iyitagikunze. Guhagarika kurungika hanze inkino vyagizwe n'Ubuhinde mu gihe bugeramiwe n'ikiza ca Covid-19, kwabangamiye imigambi yo gukingira hirya no niho kw'isi, cane cane mu bihugu vyikora ku rukingo rwa AstraZeneca. Dr Akhwale yavuze ko Kenya yari yatumije inkingo imiriyoni 30 za Johnson & Johnson bikaba vyitezwe ko zishika mu kwezi kwa munani. Abahinga bagabisha yuko kubura inkingo zikwiye mu bihugu vyo muri Afrika bishobora kuzotuma coronavirus yihindukiranya, hakaza ikibazo gikomeye nk'icibonekeje mu Buhinde. Dr Akhwale yavuze ko gusabikanya inkingo ku buryo bungana "bitegerezwa kuba". Yongeyeko ati "'ntushobora gutekana gushika abandi bose batekanye' kigomba kuguma ari icivugo ngenderwako".

column2: U﻿kraine: Isi itegerezwa guhagarika umugambi wa nicleyere w'Uburusiya - Zelensky
column3: P﻿rezida wa Ukraine Volodymyr Zelensky yavuze ko abategetsi b'Uburusiya batanguye "gutegura abanyagihugu babo" kw'ishobora gukoreshwa ry'ibigwanisho vya nicleyere. A﻿riko yongeyeko ko atemeza ko Uburusiya bwiteguye kubikoresha. M﻿u kiganiro yatanze kuri BBC, prezida Zelensky yahakanye kuba yarahamagariye kugira ibitero ku Burusiya, yemeza ko ivyo aheruka kuvuga babitahuye ukutariko. A﻿vuga ku bihano, yagize ati:"Mutegerezwa gutera imigere yo kwikingira, si ugutera." M﻿u ndwi ziheze, igisirikare ca Ukraine carisubije uturere twinshi tw'igihugu mu bitero vyatumye abasirikare b'Uburusiya bata ibirindiro vyabo bari bamazemwo igihe. M﻿uco Ukraine yise inyishu y'Uburusiya ku gutsindwa, prezida Vladimir Putin yarigaruriye uturere tune twa Ukraine. I﻿co gikorwa ciyamirijwe n'abantu benshi kuko kidakurikije amategeko, catumye haba ubwoba ko iyo ngwano imaze amezi indwi ishobora kwongerekana. Prezida Putin n'abandi bategetsi b'Uburusiyabavuze ko ibigwanisho vya nicleyere - bishobora kuba ari bito bito - bishobora gukoreshwa mu ntumbero yo gukingira utwo turere, n'aho abategetsi ba Buraya bemeza ko ata kimenyetso kihari cerekana ko Uburusiya bwiteguye kubikora. A﻿vugira mu biro vyiwe i Kyiv mu congereza, prezida Zelensky yagize ati:"Batanguye gutegura abanyagihugu babo. Birateye ubwoba. "﻿Ntibiteguye kubikora, kubikoresha. Ariko batanguye kubivugako. Ntibazi nimba bazobikoresha canke batazobikoresha. Nibaza ko biteye n'ubwoba kubivuga gusa." H﻿anyuma mu ki Ukrainiya, yavuze, ariko arasubirwamwo n'umusemuzi:"Ivyo tubona n'uko abari ku butegetsi mu Burusiya bakunda iraha, rero nibaza ko ikoreshwa ry'ibigwanisho vya nicleyere atawoshoka avyemeza nk'uko abahinga bamwe babivuga, kuko barazi ko ata gusubira inyuma umaze kubikoresha, atari ku gihugu cabo gusa, ariko no kuri bo bo nyene nk'abantu." A﻿riko yahakanye ko yahamagariye kugira ibitero ku Burusiya ku mbuga hwaniro ku musi wa kane, yemeza ko ijambo yakoresheje ryo mu ki Ukrainiya ryatahuwe nabi. I﻿vyo yari yavuze vyatanguye kwiyamirizwa n'umuvugizi w'ibiro vya prezida mu Burusiya, Dmitri Peskov avuga ko "ari nk'akamo ko gutanguza intambara nshasha y'isi", mu gihe umushikiranganji w'imigenderanire y'Uburusiya n'amakungu, Sergueï Lavrov, yavuze ko bije kwerekana impamvu yumvikana yatumye Uburusiya butera Ukraine. Inyuma y'uko gusubiramwo ivyo yavuze, P﻿rezida Zelensky yagize ati:"bafashe [abarusiya] inzira bashaka, uko babona vyobagirira inyungu, baca batangura kubisigura babitumbereza mu zindi nzira."

column2: East Africa: Miriyoni 28 bashobora kugeramirwa n'inzara ikabije - Oxfam
column3: Abantu bashika miriyoni 28 muri Afrika y'ubuseruko barashobora kugeramirwa n'inzara ikomeye cane kubera iduga ry'ibiciro bitumwe n'intambara yo muri Ukraine hamwe n'ikena ry'imvura muri uku kwezi kwa gatatu, nk'uko ishirahamwe ry'abagiraneza Oxfam rigabisha. Kenya, Somalia na Ethiopia vyugarijwe n'ikena ry'imvura rya mbere rikaze mu myaka 40, aho ni mu gihe Sudan y'Epfo yo ihanzwe n'imyuzure, nk'uko Oxfam ibandanya ivuga. Iryo shirahamwe ryerekana kandi ico ryita ugusamazwa kw'amakungu n'ingwano yo muri Ukraine, ituma hatitabwaho ikibazo c'ikena  ry'ivyo kurya mu karere ka Afrika y'ubuseruko. Itangazo rigenewe ibinyamakuru rivuga ko utwigoro mpuzamakungu two guhangana n'ico kibazo dufise uburyo budahagije na gato kuko ku miriyaridi 6 z'ama dorari ONU ikeneye mu 2022 kugira igarukire ku bari mu kaga muri Ethiopia,  Somalia na Sudan y'Epfo, 3% yonyene niyo amaze kuboneka. Madame Gabriela Bucher, umuyobozi nshingwabikorwa mpuzamakungu wa Oxfam yagabishije avuga ati: "Ibice vya Ethiopia, Kenya, Somalia, Sudan y'Epfo n'ahandi vyimirije guhura n'akaga. N'aho imvura yogwa muri uku kwezi, kwivyukiranya bizoba nk'ibidashoboka kiretse hari igikozwe  ubu nyene." Abandanya ati: "Ingaruka z'ingwano yo muri Ukraine kw'ihererekanywa ry'indya kw'isi zizoshika mu bice vyose vy'isi, ariko abasanzwe bari bakenye n'abafise intege  nke nibo zizosesereza cane kuruta abandi kandi  vyihuse kuruta." Ibihugu vya Afrika y'ubuseruko bivana  90% y'ingano bikenera muri Ukraine n'Uburusiya, nk'uko itangazo ribandanya rivuga. "Kubera uruzuba,  indogobwa zacu zarapfuye, izo dusigaranye nazo ziragoyagoya ku buryo zidashobora gukwega intunduguru  z'imizigo", ivyo bivugwa na Ahmed Mohamud Omar, umurimyi  wo muri county ya Wajiir muri Kenya. "Nguma nibaza ico umuryango wanje uzorya, aho ico bazorya ejo kizova,  niba ejo nzoronka indobo canke ibido y'amazi."

column2: Coronavirus: Prezida Jair Bolsonaro wa Brazil yayanduye - amakuru avugwa n'ahandi
column3: Inyishu z'ibipimo vyafashwe ejo ku wa mbere ku mukuru w'igihugu ca Brazil Jair Bolsonaro zerekana ko yamaze kwandura umugera  wa coronavirus. Ku mugoroba wo kuri uyu wa kabiri niho hari hitezwe inyishu z'ivyo bipimo inyuma y'aho yumvise ibimenyetso vy'iyo ndwara. Bwana Bolsonaro azwi ko yafashe minenerwe uwo mugera mu gihe Brazil ari co gihugu kiza ubwa kabiri kw'isi mu bihugu bifise abawurwaye benshi. Wewe yivugira ko kubona yarashoboye gusimba urupfu igihe aterwa ari mu myiyamamazo mu 2018, "adashobora guterwa ubwoba n'ako gacurane gato". Ejo ku wa mbere yahagaritse ingingo yategeka Abanyabrazil kwambara udupfukamunwa mu mabohero arimwo abapfungwa benshi. Mu Bwongereza, ibice bitatu vya bine vy'abantu - 78% - nta bimenyetso vya coronavirus berekana kandi bapimwe bagasanga baranduye, nk'uko vyerekanwa n'ibiharuro bitangwa n'ikigo kijejwe rusansuma. Ivyo biharuro, vyabonetse inyuma y'aho bapimiye abantu mu kivunga babasanze mu mihana yabo muri ico gihugu. Mu ndwi zibiri ziheze ibiharuro vy'abandura vyasubiye kwiyongera mu gisagara ca Melbourne, ivyatumye batekerwa n'ubwoba. Mu kwikingira, abanyagihugu baciye batangura guhagarika ingendo mu zindi ntara, bavuga bati "ni vyiza ko twobanza tukarindira kugira ngo turabe". Imbere y'aho, abayagihugu ba Australia bari biteze ko bashobora kurandurana n'imizi ico kiza, inyuma y'aho bamariye ikiringo c'ukwezi kwose atawusohoka. Ariko, ku ncuro ya mbere muri ico gihugu, biboneka ko iriko ikwirakwira mu kibano. Mu mpera z'indwi iheze, abanduye bararenze 100, uno munsi naho hafi abagera ku 200 ni bo banduye. Ku muhingamo w'uno munsi niho ingingo ya guma mu rugo yasubira gutangazwa, inyuma y'indwi nkeya basubiye mu mwidegemvyo. Ubu ikiriho, ni uko abaja gusuma bariko bacanacanako. Babona ko iyi ngingo izobakorako cane, haba mu mubereho canke mu butunzi. Ikibabaje gusumba ni uko ico gisagara ari co conyene gikozweko n'iyo ngingo kuko ibindi bice vy'igihugu bisa n'ivyanesheje coronavirus canke umurindi ukagabanuka bimwe biboneka. Amategeko mashasha asaba ko abantu bari mu mazu y'ubunywero n'ayo uburiro batandukana n'imiburiburi imetero yatanguye gushirwa mu ngiro muri Suède. Imbere y'aho, abarongoye igisata c'amagara y'abantu ntiberekana neza ingene abantu bakwiye gutandukana, n'aho abari bafise ibibanza baranguriramwo imirimo bahimirizwa kwigisha abantu gutandukana no kwirinda kuja mu kirwi. Abategetsi ba Suède baraneguwe kubera batari bashoboye gutanga neza impanuro z'ingene abantu bakwiye gutandukana. Kuva kuri uyu wa kabiri rero, abategetsi b'uburere bahawe itegeko ryo kwugara ayo mazu atazoba yakurijie ingingo yo gutandukana n'imiburiburi imetero imwe. Mu minsi iheze, abagenduzi b'igisata kijejwe ibidukikije barazungurutse mu bisagara bikuru bikuru baraba ko abantu bakurikiza ingingo yo gutandukana. Barugaje vy'agateganyo amazu arangurirwamwo imirimo ashika 40 kubera ukurundana kw'abantu vyatera impungenge ko vyari gutuma banduzanya. Abanduye umugera wa coronavirus muri Afrika y'Epfo uno munsi barenze 200,000. Umushikiranganji w'amagara y'abantu w'ico gihugu, Zweli Mkhize, avuga ko intara zine zishobora kubona ibitigiri birenze - akongerako y'uko zishobora gufatirwa ingingo za guma mu rugo. Intara zibangamiwe cane ni Gauteng, Western Cape, Eastern Cape hamwe na KwaZulu-Natal. Ku munsi ku munsi abantu baharurwa mu bihumbi ni bo bandura mu gihugu. Umushikiranganji w'amagara y'abantu avuga ko ibintu vyari kwunyuka iyo ico gihugu kidafata ingingo za guma mu rugo. Afrika y'Epfo iriko igenda itezura ingingo yafashe mu ntumbero yo kuzibira ikwirakwira rya coronavirus, zimwe muri zo zikaba zijanye no gusubira kwugurura amashure. Ico gihugu kiri mu bindi biriko birageragereza ku bantu urucanco rwa Covid-19 rwakorewe kuri Kaminuza ya Oxford mu Bwongereza. Hafi imiliyoni 11 z'abanyeshure b'Abashinwa batanguye mu bwoba bwinshi ibibazo vy'iminsi ibiri muri ico gihugu bitanga uburenganzira bwo kuja kuri kaminuza, inyuma y'uko vyungurujwe mu kiringo c'ukwezi kubera coronavirus. Ivyo bibazo bifise kugora cane kubera amashure mu gihugu cose yari yugawe igihe uwo mugera wizizira ico gihugu mu ntango z'uno mwaka. Ibinyamakuru vya leta bivuga ko zimwe mu ngingo zafashwe muri ico kiringo c'ibibazo ari ukwongereza ivyumba vyo gukoreramwo kugira ngo abanyeshure bashobore gutandukana bikwiye, gupima abigisha n'abahagarikizi, hamwe rero no gupima abanyeshure. Abanyepolitike n'abigisha baranegura ingingo yo kwaka uburenganzia bwo kuba muri ico gihugu ku banyeshure b'abanyamahanga inyuma y'ingingo yo kwigishirizwa ku mbuga ngurukanabumenyi. Igisata kijejwe uruja n'uruza muri Amerika (ICE) kivuga ko hari abantu bashobora gusubizwa iwabo kiretse  bimukiye ku mashure yigishiriza mu masomero. Hari amashure atari make muri ico gihugu ariko yihweza ingene mu mwaka w'ishure uza bokwigishiriza ku buhinga ngurukanabumenyi kubera coronavirus. Ntibiboneka neza igitigiri c'abanyeshure bazokorwako n'iyo ngingo. Ayo makuru atangajwe ku munsi nyene ishure kaminuza rya Havard ritangarijeko ko ivyigwa vyose bizokwigishirizwa ku buhinga ngurukanabumenyi mu mwaka uza, harimwo mbere no ku banyeshure bakeya basanzwe bemerewe kuba mu ndaro. Umukenguzamateka Elizabeth Warren wo mu mugambwe w'aba Democrates ati: "Kwirukana abanyeshure b'abanyamahanga muri kino gihe c'ikiza gihanze isi yose ni uguhohotera abanyeshure". "Nta shingiro bifise, ni ubukozi bw'ikibi kandi bwerekana urwanko ku banyamahanga". Eka na Samantha Power yahoze aserukira ico gihugu mw'ishirahamwe ONU ni uko nyene, aho avuga ko iyo ngingo ata shingiro ifise kandi ko kwigishiriza ku buryo ngurukanabumenyi bitazokunda ku mashure hafi yose. Umunyamakuru Elizabeth Spiers, asanzwe yigisha kw'ishure kaminuza rya New York, avuga ko iyo ngingo itazokwohoreza benshi bari basanzwe barihirwa n'amaleta yabo, kubera ubutandukanye bw'amasaha hagati ya Amerika n'ibihugu bakomokamwo.

column2: Big Fizzo yoba yariganye indirimbo ya Diamond Platnumz?
column3: Umuririmvyi rurangiranwa mu Burundi, Desire Mugani, azwi cane kw'izina rya Big Fizzo, avuga ko atiganye indirimbo ikunzwe cane ya Diamond Platnumz wo muri Tanzania. Big Fizzo yatanguye kumenyekana mu Burundi mu myaka 1996 aho yaririmba mu mugwi wavuza injana ya rap witwa N***a Soul. Ico gihe, naho igihugu cari mu bibazo bitoroshe vy'intambara, ari mu baririmvyi bake baremesha ibiteramo bihimbaye mu Burundi. Nyuma y'imyaka irenga mirongo ibiri ari muri uyu mwuga, Fizzo aracari ku rwego rwo hejuru mu muziki ndundi uvuzwa henshi wokwita pop music mu Congereza. Indirimbo ziwe zigezweho ubu nka Konzi, You na Sugua, zirirwa zisamirana ku maradiyo mu Burundi n'ahandi, mu butambiro eka mbere no ku mbuga nka Youtube, aho usanga zinaherekejwe n'amasanamu ahinguye bigezweho. Ariko bamwe mu bakunzi b'umuziki hamwe n'ababikurikiranira hafi, batanguye kwibaza niba Big Fizzo atoba ariko arafata inzira ya hafi mu kwandika indirimbo ziwe. Indirimbo Tetema y'umuririmvyi Diamond Platnumz yaririmbanye na Rayvanny imaze kurabwa kuri Youtube inshuro zirenga imiriyoni 27, kuri ubu ikaba iri mu zirabwa cane z'uwo munyamuzika. Uyumvirije ugaca unumviriza Sugua ya Big Fizzo yaririmbanye na Elly's Boy, Double Jay na Kirikou A-Kili bo mu kigo c'umukizi Bantubwoy, ntiwogenda udakozweko n'ugusa kwazo. Uhereye ku mudiho, ku ntambo co kimwe na hamwe hamwe mu majambo, ufise ugutwi kw'umuziki urashobora kwumva ko harimwo ibija gusa. BBC Gahuza yashatse kumenya ico uwo muririmvyi avuga kuri ukwo gusa kw'izo ndirimbo, ica ivugana nawe aho asanzwe ari mu gihugu c'Ubutariyano. Big Fizzo yatanguye ahakana ko ata ntumbero n'imwe yigeze agira yo kwigana iyo ndirimbo Tetema ya Diamond Platnumz. Yagize ati: "Abantu bavuga ivyo amatwi yabo agomba kuba atumva neza. Ntushobora kuvuga ko indirimbo zisa kubera ko gusa zifise umudiho umwe. "None duce tuvuga ko zouk zose zisa? Canke ko reggae zose zisa? Ku ntambo naho, imiziki myinshi abantu batamba bimwe, none ni kangahe batamba ndombolo mu miziki yo muri Kongo?" Fizzo kandi abandanya avuga ko mu ndirimbo nyinshi abantu bandika bimwe, gusa bigatandukanywa n'umudiho w'indirimbo canke injana. Ati: "None nk'ubu noreka kuririmba ngira nti 'ndagukunda' kuko hari uwundi yabivuze? Ivyo ntibishoboka. Amajambo ategerezwa gusa, ariko uburyo tubiririmba nibwo buzana ubudasa". Iyindi ndirimbo bivugwa ko Big Fizzo yiganye ni indirimo You, aririmba asa n'uwiyama abamuzanako ingorane mu buryo butandukanye. Iyi ndirimbo nayo uyumvirije, hanyuma ugaca wumviriza indirimbo yitwa F*** You y'umuririmvyi Kizz Daniel wo muri Nigeria, uca umengo hahindutse ururimi n'umurindi gusa. Fizzo yagize ati: "Kuri iyi ndirimbo yoyo sinobesha, kuko Kizz Daniel yampaye 'inspiration'. Harimwo vyinshi bisa muri izo ndirimbo zibiri. Wumvirije nko ku gitari hoho uravyumva." Big Fizzo yabandanije avuga ko ari ibintu bisanzwe kwisunga abandi baririmvyi, mu gihe ugerageje ukazanamwo umwihariko wawe. Abaririmvyi basubiramwo indirimbo z'abandi canke bifashisha bimwe mu biri mu ndirimbo z'abandi bariho, kandi si ibintu vya vuba eka mbere na barurangiranwa mu muzi barabikoze. Aha twotanga nk'akarorero ka Michael Jackson ku ndirimbo ya Manu Dibango yitwa Soul Makossa. Umuhisi Michael Jackson yafashe amajambo "ma-mako, ma-ma-sa, mako-mako ssa", ari mu iyo ndirimbo, ayakoresha mu ndirimbo yiwe "Wanna be starting something". Michael Jackson yaremeye ko yitije ayo majambo ayashira mu ndirimbo yiwe, aca yemera kuriha amahera Dibambo bitarinze guca muri sentare. Mu mwaka uheze, vyaramenyekanye ko hatanguye urubanza rwarezwemwo Ed Sheeran ku ndirimbo yiwe "Thinking Out Loud", urubanza rukibandanya. Umuryango wa Ed Townsend, yandikiye hamwe na Marvin Gay indirimbo rurangiranwa "Let's Get it On", wareze Ed Sheeran kwigana iyo ndirimbo ntegerwa yo mu 1973. Gutera imbere kw'ikintu ico ari co cose kuvana n'ubwira abagikora bagishiramwo hamwe n'umwihariko gifise mu kwitandukanya n'ibindi bikorerwa ahandi. Mu gihe vyotangura kwibazwa ko abaririmvyi mu Burundi atakindi bakora atari gukoporora indirimbo z'abandi, kazoza k'umuziki wo mu Burundi koba kageramiwe. Vyoba ari ibintu bitangaje kuko u Burundi bwamye bufise abaririmvyi bandika indirimbo nziza zibereye ugutwi nka ba Canco Amisi, Christophe Matata, Africa Nova, Kidumu eka mbere na Big Fizzo. Mu gutera imbere kw'umuziki ni ngombwa ko urwaruka rugitangura kwumva imuziki mu gihugu kinaka, rwumvishwa umuziki wihariye wo muri ico gihugu. Iki ni igikorwa cega abanyamuziki bo nyene, ariko cane cane amaradiyo ategura ibiganiro vy'urwaruka harimwo umuziki.
